mapper.select: select t.*, m.id writer_id, m.name writer_name from TALK_TB t join MEMBER_TB m on t.writer_seq = m.seq where t.member_seq = #{member_seq} order by talk_seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into TALK_TB ( member_seq, talk_seq, writer_seq, contents_talk, contents_uploadfile_path, create_date) values( #{member_seq}, (select nvl(max(talk_seq), 0)+1 from TALK_TB where member_seq = #{member_seq}) , #{writer_seq}, #{contents_talk}, #{contents_uploadfile_path}, sysdate)
